_comment: Sample JSON template for filling DOCX templates
_instructions: Replace placeholder values with your actual data. Use {{key}} syntax in your DOCX template.
name: John Doe
description: This is a sample description that can contain multiple sentences. It demonstrates how longer text fields can be filled in templates.
notes: Additional notes or comments can be added here. This field is useful for any supplementary information that doesn't fit into other categories.
terms: Payment due within 30 days. Late payments subject to 1.5% monthly interest.
